name: Unity Project 10 - New Battle
description:
Overworld

PC: Click anywhere to move / talk.

Mobile: Tap anywhere to move / talk.

Battle

PC: Press the buttons on screen / WASD keys to attack, defend, escape or heal. When attacking, click on the enemy to target it and attack!

Mobile: Press the buttons on screen to attack, defend, escape or heal. When attacking, tap on the enemy to target it and attack!
